SA15dhkhetuu:01709_0: ajanita-atiśayaḥ kāryaṃ kuryāt, karotu nāma; so asya svabhāvo
SA15dhkhetuu:01711_0: api tathā syād ity uktam atat-svabhāvas tu tadā apy akāraka eva.

SA15dhkhetuu:01811_0: svabhāva-antara-utpattiḥ pratyuktā. tatra api pūrvakasya sva-rasa-nirodhitvād

SA15dhkhetuu:02019_0: gomaya-ādeḥ śālūka-ādiḥ. na vijātīyād utpattiḥ. tathāvidham
SA15dhkhetuu:02020_0: eva hi tādṛśām ādi-nimittam iti na kāraṇa-bhedaḥ. prabandhena

SA15dhkhetuu:02310_0: tena kaścit sambandho bhavet, yathā kṛtakatva-anityatvayor eka-artha-
